name: D&DDR
description:
Time for an adventure... but not yours! You are a figure, playing out the campaign for a mysterious party. Be sure to follow the outcome of the rolls correctly or the DM will get mad!

Brackeys game jam 2022

P.S. 90% of the game was made with < 12 hours on the timer . Oops 🤷‍♂️ (exaggerating lol ok I'm tired)
